text.tspan: Two endpoints are exposed in the light client
resolver both can be configured in the Aries agent
The light client node connects to multiple
full nodes to validate block headers.
These nodes are referred to as “witnesses”
Multiple full nodes run in conjunction to enable
The Elesto agent resolves DID documents from
DID documents are used in all of the
A controller controls a cloud agent by
sending commands to the cloud agent
The elesto-did-driver is a docker image that is
shipped with the DIF uni-resolver that will run
